if so be <S%G1489>that<s%> ye <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> were <S%G1321>taught<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, even <S%G2531>as<s%> <S%G225>truth<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>:
